detectors.description: TaurusPay.claimTokensToOwner(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3e329ca5380c6b416cf095ed1a662c378a2b630_TaurusPay.sol#405-414) ignores return value by token.transfer(owner,balance) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3e329ca5380c6b416cf095ed1a662c378a2b630_TaurusPay.sol#412)

TaurusPay.setPriceClaim(uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3e329ca5380c6b416cf095ed1a662c378a2b630_TaurusPay.sol#416-419) should emit an event for: 
	- priceClaim = _newPriceClaim (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3e329ca5380c6b416cf095ed1a662c378a2b630_TaurusPay.sol#418)

TaurusPay.setNumberClaimToken(uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3e329ca5380c6b416cf095ed1a662c378a2b630_TaurusPay.sol#421-424) should emit an event for: 
	- numberClaimToken = _newNumClaimToken (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3e329ca5380c6b416cf095ed1a662c378a2b630_TaurusPay.sol#423)

TaurusPay.constructor(address)._owner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3e329ca5380c6b416cf095ed1a662c378a2b630_TaurusPay.sol#265) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = _owner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3e329ca5380c6b416cf095ed1a662c378a2b630_TaurusPay.sol#267)

Reentrancy in TaurusPay.claimTokensToOwner(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3e329ca5380c6b416cf095ed1a662c378a2b630_TaurusPay.sol#405-414):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3e329ca5380c6b416cf095ed1a662c378a2b630_TaurusPay.sol#411)
	- token.transfer(owner,balance) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3e329ca5380c6b416cf095ed1a662c378a2b630_TaurusPay.sol#412)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Transfer(_token,owner,balance) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3e329ca5380c6b416cf095ed1a662c378a2b630_TaurusPay.sol#413)
